solution_line_template: Betty paid {num_slippers} x ${cost_per_slipper} = $<<{num_slippers}*{cost_per_slipper}={cost_slippers}>>{cost_slippers} for the slippers.
She paid {num_lipsticks} x ${cost_per_lipstick} = $<<{num_lipsticks}*{cost_per_lipstick}={cost_lipsticks}>>{cost_lipsticks} for the lipsticks.
She paid {num_hair_color} x ${cost_per_hair_color} = $<<{num_hair_color}*{cost_per_hair_color}={cost_hair_color}>>{cost_hair_color} for the hair color.
